item.title: Create a Color Cli in Golang
item.description: In this tutorial, we will create a color cli in golang using cobra library. CLI is a standard interface between a software and a user. A command-line interface (CLI) processes commands to a computer program in the form of lines of text. - Wikipedia Objective of the color cli The objective of the colorcli is to return the name of the hexcode of the color. If the hexcode doesn't exist then colorcli can add the color.
